ComicInfo.Summary: The team must put their past failure behind them and regroup as they prepare to put their lives on the line once more for their next mission: To prevent a massive arms trade about to take place between South America's largest drug cartel and a weapon's dealer peddling a destructive new Echo model. But when they discover on their mission that these Echoes are much more powerful than anything they've ever encountered, they wonder if this mission might be their last...
